item.description:
Hello!

Heading south-side for a walk in Lincoln Woods State Park in Lincoln, RI.

Here's some basic info: http://www.riparks.com/Locations/LocationLincolnWoods.html

PDF of the trail system is included on the above website.  Feel free to open the trail map and follow along!  Go on... :)

We'll do the paved loop around Olney Pond (which as far as I can guess will be about an hour) and then go off-pavement in "Zone B" for about another hour....or maybe we do more pavement.  I don't know.  I'm open.  This will be my first time at this park so we'll "wing it" a bit.

Parking:  There looks to be a parking area on the lower left corner of the map (left of Olney Pond near the restrooms).  Let's meet in that parking area at 11.

The weather looks like it will be in the low 40s, no precip.  I'll keep an eye on it and cancel for serious weather.  Hope to see you there!

Google:

http://maps.google.com/maps?q=Lincoln+Woods+State+Park,+Lincoln,+RI&hl=en&ll=41.903491,-71.430273&spn=0.024722,0.055189&sll=42.036922,-71.683501&sspn=1.578837,3.532104&oq=Lincoln+...
item.how_to_find_us: Parking area on the left side of trail map
item.name: Lincoln Woods (RI)
